name: Core-plugin
tagline: The PDT Extension Group Core Plugin
body:
### Welcome to Core-Plugin.
The PDT extension group is a collobaration of PDT plugin maintainers to build a central PDT extension platform and codebase.

### Composites:
* Release : http://p2.pdt-extensions.org/
* Nightly : http://p2-dev.pdt-extensions.org/

### Direct P2 update sites:
* Release : http://core-plugin.github.io/latest
* Nightly : http://core-plugin.github.io/nightly
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
